title: E-Commerce-Sales-Analysis-for-Data-Driven-Decision-Making
description: This project provides an interactive dashboard for E-Commerce Sales Analysis using RFM Customer Segmentation. The dashboard enables data-driven decision making by visualizing key metrics such as customer distribution by segment, average spend, total sales, and average recency across different customer groups.

title: HR-Analytics-Dashboard
description: This repository contains an **HR Analytics Project** using both **Python (Jupyter Notebook)** and **Power BI**. The goal is to analyze employee attrition, demographics, and satisfaction to gain insights that help HR teams make data-driven decisions.

title: Netflix Movies & TV Shows Analysis
description: This project explores and analyzes the Netflix dataset, which contains information about movies and TV shows available on the platform. The workflow is divided into two parts.

title: COVID-19 Global Data Analysis Dashboard
description: This repository contains an exploratory data analysis (EDA) and visualization project on the WHO COVID-19 global dataset.The goal is to analyze the spread of COVID-19 across countries and regions using Python and create clear, interactive charts.
